item.title: How children are carried
item.summary: Manner of carrying a young baby in use among Bushman women. Partly in Bushman by and partly in English after /han≠kass’o (L VIII.27. 8406 rev., note).
item.comments: 1) This story is found in Book VIII-27
item.author: |han≠kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)

keyword.subkw: how they are carried when very little
